verses.verse: Therefore you shall love<WH157> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>, and keep<WH8104> his charge<WH4931>, and his statutes<WH2708>, and his judgments<WH4941>, and his commandments<WH4687>, always<WH3117>.

And know<WH3045> you this day<WH3117>: for I speak not with your sons<WH1121> which have not known<WH3045>, and which have not seen<WH7200> the chastisement<WH4148> of the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>, his greatness<WH1433>, his mighty<WH2389> hand<WH3027>, and his stretched out<WH5186> arm<WH2220>,
And his miracles<WH226>, and his acts<WH4639>, which he did<WH6213> in the middle<WH8432> of Egypt<WH4714> unto Pharaoh<WH6547> the king<WH4428> of Egypt<WH4714>, and unto all his land<WH776>;

And what he did<WH6213> unto the army<WH2428> of Egypt<WH4714>, unto their horses<WH5483>, and to their chariots<WH7393>; how he made the water<WH4325> of the Red<WH5488> sea<WH3220> to overflow<WH6687> them<WH6440> as they pursued<WH7291> after<WH310> you<WH3068>, and how the Lord has destroyed<WH6> them unto this day<WH3117>;
And what he did<WH6213> unto you in the wilderness<WH4057>, until you came<WH935> into this place<WH4725>;

And what he did<WH6213> unto Dathan<WH1885> and Abiram<WH48>, the sons<WH1121> of Eliab<WH446>, the son<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205>: how the earth<WH776> opened<WH6475> her mouth<WH6310>, and swallowed them up<WH1104>, and their households<WH1004>, and their tents<WH168>, and all the substance<WH3351> that was in their possession<WH7272>, in the middle<WH7130> of all Israel<WH3478>:
But your eyes<WH5869> have seen<WH7200> all the great<WH1419> acts<WH4639> of the Lord<WH3068> which he did<WH6213>.

Therefore shall you keep<WH8104> all the commandments<WH4687> which<WH834> I command<WH6680> you this day<WH3117>, that you may be strong<WH2388>, and go in<WH935> and possess<WH3423> the land<WH776>, where you go<WH5674> to possess it<WH3423>;

And that you may prolong<WH748> your days<WH3117> in the land<WH127>, which the Lord<WH3068> swore<WH7650> unto your fathers<WH1> to give<WH5414> unto them and to their seed<WH2233>, a land<WH776> that flows<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey<WH1706>.

For the land<WH776>, where you go in<WH935> to possess<WH3423> it<WH776>, is not as the land of Egypt<WH4714>, from from where you came out<WH3318>, where you sowed<WH2232> your seed<WH2233>, and watered<WH8248> it with your foot<WH7272>, as a garden<WH1588> of herbs<WH3419>:
But the land<WH776>, where you go<WH5674> to possess<WH3423> it<WH776>, is a land of hills<WH2022> and valleys<WH1237>, and drinks<WH8354> water<WH4325> of the rain<WH4306> of heaven<WH8064>:

A land<WH776> which the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> cares for<WH1875>: the eyes<WH5869> of the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> are always<WH8548> upon it<WH7225>, from the beginning of the year<WH8141> even unto the end<WH319> of the year<WH8141>.

And it shall come to pass<WH8085>, if you shall listen diligently<WH8085> unto my commandments<WH4687> which I command<WH6680> you this day<WH3117>, to love<WH157> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>, and to serve<WH5647> him with all your heart<WH3824> and with all your soul<WH5315>,

That I will give<WH5414> you the rain<WH4306> of your land<WH776> in his due season<WH6256>, the first rain<WH3138> and the latter rain<WH4456>, that you may gather<WH622> in your corn<WH1715>, and your wine<WH8492>, and your oil<WH3323>.
And I will send<WH5414> grass<WH6212> in your fields<WH7704> for your cattle<WH929>, that you may eat<WH398> and be full<WH7646>.
Take care<WH8104> to yourselves<WH3824>, that your heart be not deceived<WH6601>, and you turn aside<WH5493>, and serve<WH5647> other<WH312> gods<WH430>, and worship them<WH7812>;

And then the Lord<WH3068>'s wrath<WH639> be kindled<WH2734> against you<WH6113>, and he shut up the heaven<WH8064>, that there be no rain<WH4306>, and that the land<WH127> yield<WH5414> not her fruit<WH2981>; and lest you perish<WH6> quickly<WH4120> from off the good<WH2896> land<WH776> which the Lord<WH3068> gives you<WH5414>.

Therefore shall you lay up<WH7760> these my words<WH1697> in your heart<WH3824> and in your soul<WH5315>, and bind<WH7194> them for a sign<WH226> upon your hand<WH3027>, that they may be as frontlets<WH2903> between your eyes<WH5869>.

And you shall teach<WH3925> them your sons<WH1121>, speaking<WH1696> of them when you sit<WH3427> in your house<WH1004>, and when you walk<WH3212> by the way<WH1870>, when you lie<WH7901> down<WH6965>, and when you rise up.
And you shall write<WH3789> them upon the door posts<WH4201> of your house<WH1004>, and upon your gates<WH8179>:

That your days<WH3117> may be multiplied<WH7235>, and the days<WH3117> of your sons<WH1121>, in the land<WH127> which the Lord<WH3068> swore<WH7650> unto your fathers<WH1> to give<WH5414> them<WH3117>, as the days of heaven<WH8064> upon the earth<WH776>.

For if you shall diligently<WH8104> keep<WH8104> all these commandments<WH4687> which I command<WH6680> you<WH6213>, to do them<WH157>, to love the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>, to walk<WH3212> in all his ways<WH1870>, and to cleave unto him<WH1692>;
Then will the Lord<WH3068> drive out<WH3423> all these nations<WH1471> from before<WH6440> you<WH3423>, and you shall possess greater<WH1419> nations<WH1471> and mightier than yourselves<WH6099>.

Every place<WH4725> whereon the soles<WH3709> of your feet<WH7272> shall tread<WH1869> shall be yours<WH4057>: from the wilderness and Lebanon<WH3844>, from the river<WH5104>, the river<WH5104> Euphrates<WH6578>, even unto the outermost<WH314> sea<WH3220> shall your coast be<WH1366>.

There shall no man<WH376> be able to stand<WH3320> before<WH6440> you<WH3068>: for the Lord your God<WH430> shall lay<WH5414> the fear<WH6343> of you and the dread<WH4172> of you upon<WH6440> all the land<WH776> that you shall tread<WH1869> upon<WH1696>, as he has said unto you.
Behold<WH7200>, I set<WH5414> before<WH6440> you this day<WH3117> a blessing<WH1293> and a curse<WH7045>;
A blessing<WH1293>, if you obey<WH8085> the commandments<WH4687> of the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>, which I command<WH6680> you this day<WH3117>:

And a curse<WH7045>, if you will not obey<WH8085> the commandments<WH4687> of the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>, but turn aside<WH5493> out of the way<WH1870> which I command<WH6680> you this day<WH3117>, to go<WH3212> after<WH310> other<WH312> gods<WH430>, which you have not known<WH3045>.

And it shall come to pass<WH3068>, when the Lord your God<WH430> has brought you in<WH935> unto the land<WH776> where you go<WH935> to possess<WH3423> it<WH5414>, that you shall put the blessing<WH1293> upon mountain<WH2022> Gerizim<WH1630>, and the curse<WH7045> upon mountain<WH2022> Ebal<WH5858>.

Are they not on the other side<WH5676> Jordan<WH3383>, by<WH310> the way<WH1870> where the sun<WH8121> goes down<WH3996>, in the land<WH776> of the Canaanites<WH3669>, which live<WH3427> in the Arabah<WH6160> over against<WH4136> Gilgal<WH1537>, beside<WH681> the plains<WH436> of Moreh<WH4176>?

For you shall pass over<WH5674> Jordan<WH3383> to go in<WH935> to possess<WH3423> the land<WH776> which the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> gives<WH5414> you<WH3423>, and you shall possess it<WH3427>, and live in it.
And you shall observe<WH8104> to do<WH6213> all the statutes<WH2706> and judgments<WH4941> which I set<WH5414> before<WH6440> you this day<WH3117>.
